info.title: Performativ
info.description:
Welcome to the API documentation for Performativ.

The API RESTful and designed to be easy to use and understand with predictable resource-orientated URLS, standard HTTP status codes, and JSON-formatted responses.

parameters.name: filter[cash_account_type_id]

parameters.description: Filter by projection flag. Defaults to false (excludes projections)

get.description: Get client/portfolio performance contribution by grouping type.

Projects portfolio values over a 10-year horizon using VaR, calculating
confidence intervals (5th, 50th, and 95th percentiles) based on historical
returns and volatility

parameters.name: clientIds
parameters.description: Required if `portfolioId` and `groupId` are all not specified.

parameters.name: portfolioIds
parameters.description: Required if `clientId` and `groupId` are all not specified.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Required if `clientId` and `portfolioId` are all not specified.

parameters.name: window
parameters.description: Window length (in months) for VaR calculation

get.description: Returns all instances (active and inactive) for a given plugin.

Returns the HMAC signing key used to verify webhook signatures.
Use this key to validate the `x-webhook-signature` header on incoming webhooks.

Returns webhook delivery records for a plugin instance, newest first.
Filterable by `status` and `event_type` query parameters.

Cursor-based read-only endpoint. No server-side state tracking.
Clients manage their own cursor via the `after` (delivery UUID) or `since` (timestamp) params.

post.description:
Resets a delivery to pending and re-queues it for delivery.
Cannot replay a delivery that is currently being processed.
